results.title: Improvement of Intestinal Pseudo-Obstruction by Total Parenteral Nutrition in a Young Woman With Mitochondrial Myopathy, Encephalopathy, Lactic Acidosis, and Stroke-Like Episodes: A Case Report
results.text_hl: A 20-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with a two-year history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ was taking @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ but her hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) levels began increasing. After receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, she suffered a @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-like attack and was diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_MELAS_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017241 @@@MELAS@@@.

results.title: Case Report: Late-Onset Mitochondrial Disease Uncovered by Metformin Use in a Patient With Acute Verbal Auditory Agnosia
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is known to inhibit mitochondrial function and could trigger clinical features of @<m>DISEASE_MELAS_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017241 @@@MELAS syndrome@@@.
